name: Knight Quest (Offbeet)
description:
Knight Quest is an medieval fantasy inspired first person RPG made on Turbowarp/Scratch.

List of Music Used:

Title Screen: Find Mii (Streetpass 3DS) - Title

Map Screen: Kirby Superstar Ultra Dynablade - Map

Game Win: Final Fantasy Victory Fanfare

                   Friday Night Funkin' - Breakfast

Game Lost: Sonic 1 - Gameover

Level 1, 3, and 4: Super Smash Bros. 4/Melee - How to play

Level 2: Undertale - Snowy

Level 5: TBD

Secret Level: Mortimer - Spooky Lab

Mortimer's Channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6xGQsUNEWwoWVWNZmhDGow

By no means do I claim any of the above as my own, and completely agree from the original artists to change any of the music from the game if they said to do so. (since it's scratch I'm sure no one cares anyway)

Everything else comes from Scratch's library of sounds
